about.title: About Us
about.mission_long: Professional Team Photos: “Faces Behind the Work” — Smiling team members photographed in the office bring sincerity, trust and professionalism together. Providing a reliable, transparent and fast car rental experience to our customers is our top priority. Knowing that every individual has different needs, we develop flexible, innovative and personalized solutions. Our goal is to make your journey not only effortless but also enjoyable. We continuously improve our service quality by focusing on technology, customer satisfaction and ongoing development. Together with our experienced team, we operate with a service approach that makes a difference in the car rental industry; we work to offer trust, comfort and convenience all at once. We are here to ensure that every moment of your journey is more comfortable, safer and happier than planned.
about.vision_long: Professional Team Photos: “Faces Behind the Work” — Photos featuring our smiling colleagues in the office naturally reflect the sincerity and professionalism of our team. Our aim is to go beyond being a brand that only offers car rental services, by prioritizing customer satisfaction above all, effectively using technology and producing environmentally friendly solutions. In line with the principles of digitalization, innovation and sustainability in the sector; we aim to become a brand that continuously improves service quality, prioritizes user experience and stands out with its reliability. With this vision, we closely follow ever-evolving technology and strive to become one of the top-of-mind car rental brands by shaping the future of the industry with our innovative solutions.
about.mission_text: To provide safe, comfortable and affordable car rental services, enhancing our customers' travel experience to the highest level.
about.vision_text: To be Turkey's most trusted and preferred car rental company, maintaining our leadership that sets the standards in the industry.

values_brief.title: Our Values
values_brief.long: We are committed to always providing a reliable, transparent and high-quality car rental experience. We put honesty and customer satisfaction first in all our processes and aim to deliver services that exceed expectations. While guaranteeing safe driving with our well-maintained and renewed fleet, we avoid surprises with our transparent pricing policy. Our professional team stands by our customers with a solution-oriented approach at every step. By developing environmentally friendly and sustainable solutions, we care about protecting both nature and the economy. With our 24/7 support approach, we are with you at every moment of your journey.

rental.terms_intro: Rental terms and general conditions are listed below. Please read before booking.
rental.term_age: Driver must be at least 21 years old.
rental.term_license: A valid driver's license for at least 2 years is required.
rental.term_additional_driver: Additional drivers must be specified in the contract and meet the same conditions.
rental.docs_credit_card: Credit card in driver's name for deposit
rental.term_deposit: A credit card is required for the deposit.
rental.term_payment: Payments are collected in advance; currency conversions depend on your bank's rate on the payment day.
rental.term_insurance_basic: Vehicles are rented with mandatory traffic insurance and basic damage coverage.
rental.term_insurance_excess: The excess amount is the user's responsibility; it can be reduced with additional coverage.
rental.term_accident_report: Accident report and alcohol test are mandatory in case of damage.
rental.term_mileage: Daily mileage limit is specified in the contract; excess is subject to extra fees.
rental.term_fuel: Fuel policy is evaluated according to the level you return the vehicle.
rental.term_fines: Traffic fines and toll fees are the renter's responsibility.
rental.term_smoking: Smoking is prohibited inside the vehicle.
rental.term_geo: Taking the vehicle abroad requires company approval.
rental.term_pickup_window: 1-hour free waiting period from the reservation time.
rental.term_late_return: Late return is subject to additional fees based on the daily rate.
rental.term_cleaning: A detailed cleaning fee may be charged in case of excessive dirt.
rental.term_cancel_free: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before pickup time.
rental.term_cancel_fee: Cancellations within the last 24 hours may incur a one-day fee.
rental.contact_help: For any questions, please contact us via WhatsApp.
